item.description:
Please join the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club and its members the weekend of October 31 - November 2nd for a Halloween weekend in the White Mountains of New Hampshire. It is the spookiest Halloween event ever. Costumes required and be creative!

Schedule:

• Arrive Friday night anytime after 7:30PM. Beer & Wine from 9-Midnight
• Saturday we will do a short hike or you can shop at the tax-free outlets
• The hike should only take a few hours and we will have dinner at the house.
• Saturday afternoon, Saturday evening - get dressed up for the Halloween Party
• Sunday for those interested we will plan a short hike.

Food: $25 includes
- Saturday Breakfast
- Saturday Dinner with wine
- Sunday Breakfast

Overnight Accommodations:
Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club, Bartlett, NH $20 guest fee/night/person
There are 21 bedrooms, dorm style and separated by gender.
Bring your own sheets, blanket, pillow. A sleeping bag and pillow work well too.
Bring toiletries, etc... and your costume

Halloween Event Cost $10

For directions to the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club &
more information: www.wedeln.com

To RSVP, you will need to pay $22 via Amazon to cover one night's guest fee and Amazon fee. Last time, too many people backed out at the last minute. This will be non-refundable. When you rsvp "YES", you can pay via AMAZON and I will give you instructions on how to do so.

Any questions, please contact me.

Regards,
Jonathan
item.name: Halloween Weekend @ Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club
